actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Resolution to commend U.S. initiatives in seeking international cooperative solutions to the oil crisis.

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives commends United States initiatives in seeking international cooperative solutions to the oil crisis, and supports the purposes and procedures set forth in the communique of the International Washington Energy Conference just conducted.

titles.title: Resolution to commend U.S. initiatives in seeking international cooperative solutions to the oil crisis.
